TopicTitle: HLV Boost. 130 tons to LKO 15% payload fraction.

Articles.Content:
After playing around with the SLS parts for a bit and not managing to build a launcher I liked, I decided to simply upsize my smaller launcher which was itself a Falcon 9 replica. The HLV Boost was the result and from the first flight its proved its worth as an extremely powerful and efficient launch vehicle. With it I can place 130 tons of payload into a 80km orbit with a payload fraction of 15%!

Craft: https://www.dropbox.com/s/1p6596wkljj42ac/HLV%20Boost.craft
